metadata.title: CVE-2013-4341 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Moodle through2.2.11, 2.3.x before 2.3.9, 2.4.x before 2.4.6, and 2.5.x before 2.5.2allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a craftedblog link within an RSS feed.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4341` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1').
